CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( OR(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "UK "),CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "FR"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "NL"),CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "DE")), Opportunity.Camera_Only_Deal__c = true, OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Internal_Finance_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Account.Samsara_PreApproval_Status__c, "Approved") )),"UK,KD,KC",
IF( AND(Opportunity.Camera_Only_Deal__c = true, OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Internal_Finance_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Account.Samsara_PreApproval_Status__c, "Approved") )),"US,AD,AC,DM",
IF( AND(Opportunity.Camera_Only_Deal__c = true, OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Internal_Finance_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly"),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Account.Samsara_PreApproval_Status__c, "Approved") )),"US,AD,AC",
IF( AND( OR(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "UK "),CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "FR"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "NL"),CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "DE")), Opportunity.Camera_Only_Deal__c = false, OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Internal_Finance_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Account.Samsara_PreApproval_Status__c, "Approved") )),"UK,KD,KC",
IF( AND(Opportunity.Camera_Only_Deal__c = false, OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Internal_Finance_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Account.Samsara_PreApproval_Status__c, "Approved") )),"US,AD,AC,DM",
IF( AND(OR(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "UK"),CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "FR"),CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "NL"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "DE")), Opportunity.Camera_Only_Deal__c = false, OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Internal_Finance_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly"),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Account.Samsara_PreApproval_Status__c, "Approved") )),"UK,KD",
IF( AND(Opportunity.Camera_Only_Deal__c = false, OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Internal_Finance_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Account.Samsara_PreApproval_Status__c, "Approved") )),"US,AD",
IF( AND(OR(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "UK"),CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "FR"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "NL"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "DE")), Opportunity.Camera_Only_Deal__c = true, OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Internal_Finance_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Account.Samsara_PreApproval_Status__c, "Approved")) )),"UK,KC",
IF( AND( Opportunity.Camera_Only_Deal__c = true, OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Internal_Finance_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Account.Samsara_PreApproval_Status__c, "Approved")) )),"US,AC",
IF( AND(OR(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "UK"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "FR"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "NL"),CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "DE")), Opportunity.Camera_Only_Deal__c = false, OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Internal_Finance_Payment_Type__c , "Approved")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Account.Samsara_PreApproval_Status__c, "Approved")) )),"UK",
"US"))))))))))
CustomField.label: [Depreacte] Samsara Finance-conga
